Ice_Bolt.help: Your Attack and Movement rate has been slowed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Ice_Blast.help: You have been frozen by an Ice Blast. Your movement Speed and Recharge rate are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Frost_Breath.help: You are frozen by the Frost Breath. You are taking damage over time and your attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage over time.

Ice_Storm.help: The Ice Storm is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your attack and movement speeds are reduced.

Frozen_Armor.help: While this power is active, you coat yourself in rock hard Frozen Armor. The hardness of the Frozen Armor offers good defense to Smashing and Lethal attack as well as reduces Cold damage. Also, Fire attacks deal slightly less damage. Recharge: Very Fast

Gale.help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Freeze_Ray.help: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.help: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Blast.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Blizzard.help: The Blizzard is freezing you. You are taking Cold damage over time and your Accuracy, attack speed and movement speed are reduced.

Snow_Storm.help: The chill from this Snow Storm has dramatically Slowed your attack and movement speed.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} engulfs you in a {PowerName} slowing your movement speed.

Glacier.help: You are frozen in a Glacier. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.
